resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital input

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The cumulative value of active state detected

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Polarity
resourcedefs.description: The polarity of a digital input as a Boolean (0 = Normal, 1= Reversed)

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Debounce Period
resourcedefs.description: The debounce period in ms

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Edge Selection
resourcedefs.description: The edge selection as an integer (1=Falling edge, 2=Rising edge, 3=Both Rising and Falling edge)

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter Reset
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Counter value

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Wake UP
resourcedefs.description: If true, wakes up the device from sleeping state to notify the value in the LWM. Only for UDPQueue mode

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the output as a string, for instance, â€œFlood sensorâ€

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor, for instance PIR type

resourcedefs.name: Short Server ID
resourcedefs.description: Used as link to associate server Object Instance.

resourcedefs.name: Lifetime
resourcedefs.description: Specify the lifetime of the registration in seconds.

resourcedefs.name: Default Minimum Period
resourcedefs.description: The default value the LWM2M Client should use for the Minimum Period of an Observation in the absence of this parameter being included in an Observation.

resourcedefs.name: Default Maximum Period
resourcedefs.description: The default value the LWM2M Client should use for the Maximum Period of an Observation in the absence of this parameter being included in an Observation.

resourcedefs.name: Disable
resourcedefs.description: If this Resource is executed, this LWM2M Server Object is disabled for a certain period defined in the Disabled Timeout Resource. After receiving â€œExecuteâ€ operation, LWM2M Client MUST send response of the operation and perform de-registration process.

resourcedefs.name: Disable Timeout
resourcedefs.description: A period to disable the Server. After this period, the LWM2M Client MUST perform registration process to the Server. If this Resource is not set, a default timeout value is 86400

resourcedefs.name: Notification Storing When Disabled or Offline
Binding
resourcedefs.range: The possible values of Resource are listed in 5.2.1.1
resourcedefs.description: This Resource defines the transport binding configured for the LWM2M Client

resourcedefs.name: Registration Update Trigger
resourcedefs.description: If this Resource is executed the LWM2M Client MUST perform an â€œUpdateâ€ operation with this LWM2M Server using the Current Transport Binding and Mode

resourcedefs.name: Digital Output State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of a digital output

resourcedefs.name: Digital Output Polarity
resourcedefs.description: The polarity of a digital ouput as a Boolean (0 = Normal, 1= Reversed)

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the output as a string, for instance, â€œLEDâ€

resourcedefs.name: Digital Output Timeout
resourcedefs.description: 0 means manually manage turn off the GPIO 0. If seconds >0, then GPIO auto turn off the output after this certain milliseconds

resourcedefs.name: Analog Input Current Value
resourcedefs.description: The current value of the analog input.

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Application Type
resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string.

resourcedefs.name: Sensor type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor, for instance PIR type

resourcedefs.name: Manufacturer
resourcedefs.description: Human readable manufacturer name

resourcedefs.name: Model Number
resourcedefs.description: Type of the device (manufacturer specified string : e.g. smart meters / dev Classâ€¦)

resourcedefs.name: Serial Number
resourcedefs.description: A model identifier (manufacturer specified string)

resourcedefs.name: Firmware Version
resourcedefs.description: Current firmware version of the device.

resourcedefs.name: Reboot
resourcedefs.description: Reboot the LWM2M Device to restore the Device from unexpected firmware failure.

resourcedefs.name: Factory Reset
resourcedefs.description: Perform factory reset of the LWM2M Device to make the LWM2M Device have the same configuration as at the initial deployment.

resourcedefs.name: Available Power Sources
resourcedefs.description: 0 â€“ DC power 1 â€“ Internal Battery 2 â€“ External Battery 4 â€“ Power over Ethernet 5 â€“ USB 6 â€“ AC (Mains) power 7 â€“ Solar

resourcedefs.name: Power Source Voltage
resourcedefs.description: Present voltage for each Available Power Sources Resource Instance.

resourcedefs.name: Power Source Current
resourcedefs.description: Present current for each Available Power Source

resourcedefs.name: Battery Level
resourcedefs.description: Contains the current battery  level as a percentage (with a range from 0 to 100). This value is only valid when the value of Available Power Sources Resource is 1.

resourcedefs.name: Memory Free
resourcedefs.description: Estimated current available amount of storage space which can store data and software in the LWM2M Device (expressed in kilobytes).

resourcedefs.name: Error Code
resourcedefs.description: 0=No error, 1=Low battery power, 2=External power supply off, 3=GPS module failure, 4=Low received signal strength, 5=Out of memory, 6=SMS failure, 7=IP connectivity failure, 8=Peripheral malfunction

resourcedefs.name: Current Time
resourcedefs.description: Current UNIX time of the LWM2M Client.

resourcedefs.name: UTC Offset
resourcedefs.description: Current UNIX time of the LWM2M Client.

resourcedefs.name: Timezone
resourcedefs.description: Indicates in which time zone the LWM2M Device is located, in IANA Timezone (TZ) database format.

resourcedefs.name: Supported Binding and Modes
resourcedefs.description: Indicates which bindings and modes are supported in the LWM2M Client. The possible values of Resource are combination of U or UQ and S or SQ.

resourcedefs.name: Device Type
resourcedefs.description: Type of the device (manufacturer specified string: e.g., smart meters / dev Class…)

resourcedefs.name: Hardware Version
resourcedefs.description: Current hardware version of the device

resourcedefs.name: Software Version
resourcedefs.description: Current software version of the device (manufacturer specified string). On elaborated LwM2M device, SW could be split in 2 parts: a firmware one and a higher level software on top.

resourcedefs.name: Battery Status
resourcedefs.description: This value is only valid for the Device Internal Battery if present (one Available Power Sources Resource Instance value is 1). 0=Normal The battery is operating normally and not on power, 1=Charging The battery is currently charging, 2=Charge Complete The battery is fully charged and still on power, 3=Damaged The battery has some problem, 4=Low Battery The battery is low on charge, 5= Not Installed The battery is not installed, 6 = Unknown The battery information is not available

resourcedefs.name: Memory Total
resourcedefs.description: Total amount of storage space which can store data and software in the LwM2M Device (expressed in kilobytes)

resourcedefs.name: Network Bearer
resourcedefs.description: Indicates the network bearer used for the current LWM2M communication session from the below network bearer list.

resourcedefs.name: Available Network Bearer
resourcedefs.description: Indicates list of current available network bearer. Each Resource Instance has a value from the network bearer list.

resourcedefs.name: Link Quality
resourcedefs.description: Indicates list of current available network bearer. Each Resource Instance has a value from the network bearer list.

resourcedefs.name: IP Addresses
resourcedefs.description: Indicates list of current available network bearer. Each Resource Instance has a value from the network bearer list.

resourcedefs.name: Router IP Addresse
resourcedefs.description: The IP address of the next-hop IP router.

resourcedefs.name: Link Utilization
resourcedefs.description: The average utilization of the link to the next-hop IP router in %.

resourcedefs.name: APN
resourcedefs.description: Access Point Name in case Network Bearer Resource is a Cellular Network.

resourcedefs.name: Cell ID
resourcedefs.description: Access Point Name in case Network Bearer Resource is a Cellular Network.

resourcedefs.name: SMNC
resourcedefs.description: Serving Mobile Network Code. In case Network Bearer Resource has 0(cellular network). Range (0â€¦999).

resourcedefs.name: SMCC
resourcedefs.description: Serving Mobile Country Code. In case Network Bearer Resource has 0 (cellular network). Range (0â€¦999).

resourcedefs.name: Package
resourcedefs.description: Firmware package

resourcedefs.name: Package URI
resourcedefs.description: URI from where the device can download the firmware package by an alternative mechanism. As soon the device has received the Package URI it performs the download at the next practical opportunity.

resourcedefs.name: Update
resourcedefs.description: Updates firmware by using the firmware package stored, or, by using the firmware downloaded from the Package URI.

resourcedefs.name: State
resourcedefs.description: Indicates current state with respect to this firmware update. This value is set by the LWM2M Client. 0: Idle (before downloading or after updating) 1: Downloading (The data sequence is on the way) 2: Downloaded 3: Updating

resourcedefs.name: Update Result
resourcedefs.description: Contains the result of downloading or updating the firmware 0: Default value. Once the updating process is initiated, this Resource SHOULD be reset to default value. 1: Firmware updated successfully, 4: Connection lost during downloading process. 5: CRC check failure for new downloaded package.

resourcedefs.name: PkgName
resourcedefs.description: Name of the Firmware Package

resourcedefs.name: PkgVersion
resourcedefs.description: Version of the Firmware package

resourcedefs.name: Firmware Update Protocol Support
resourcedefs.description: This resource indicates what protocols the LwM2M Client implements to retrieve firmware images. 0: CoAP, 1: CoAPS, 2:HTTP 1.1, 3:HTTPS 1.1

resourcedefs.name: Firmware Update Delivery Method
resourcedefs.description: The LwM2M Client uses this resource to indicate its support for transferring firmware images to the client either via the Package Resource (=push) or via the Package URI Resource (=pull) mechanism. 0: Pull only, 1: Push only, 2: Both

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Auto-Reader Enabled
resourcedefs.description: Allow start and stop the auto-reader which will take measures along time.

resourcedefs.name: Auto-Reader Interval
resourcedefs.description: Read or edit the auto-reader interval between measures

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Value
resourcedefs.description: Last or current measured value from the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Units
resourcedefs.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. â€œLuxâ€ for Temperature in Celsius.

name: HOP Core Configuration
description: Provide specific and advanced configurations for HOP devices

resourcedefs.name: Binding Mode
resourcedefs.description: 0 means mode U (UDP - 1 means mode UQ (UDP Queue)

resourcedefs.name: Battery Voltage
resourcedefs.description: The current battery voltage.

resourcedefs.name: Advertisement Data
resourcedefs.description: Must contain AD Structures. This advertisement can not be disabled/unconfigured such as resource 15 and 16.

resourcedefs.name: Scan Response Data
resourcedefs.description: Must contain AD Structures

resourcedefs.name: Advertisement Interval
resourcedefs.description: Advertisement between announcements. (n * 0.625 mSec)

resourcedefs.name: Advertisement Channel Map
resourcedefs.description: Mask -> Channel 37 = 0x01 | Channel 38 = 0x02 | Channel 39 = 0x04 | all = 0x07

resourcedefs.name: TX Power
resourcedefs.description: TX Power selected where 0 = -23dBm,  1 = -6dBm,  2 = 0dBm

resourcedefs.name: Current connection interval
resourcedefs.description: (n * 1.25ms).  Range: 7.5 msec to 4 seconds (0x0006 to 0x0C80)

resourcedefs.name: Current timeout value
resourcedefs.description: (n * 10ms). Range: 100ms to 32 seconds (0x000a - 0x0c80)

resourcedefs.name: Battery
resourcedefs.description: Battery percent available

resourcedefs.name: Firmware version
resourcedefs.description: Current firmware version

resourcedefs.name: Secondary Advertisement Data
resourcedefs.description: Secondary optional advertisement. Set 00 will disable this advertisement.

resourcedefs.name: Tertiary Advertisement Data
resourcedefs.description: Tertiary optional advertisement. Set 00 will disable this advertisement.

resourcedefs.name: Download image percent
resourcedefs.description: Shows the downloaded percent of the upgrade image.

resourcedefs.name: Latitude
resourcedefs.description: The decimal notation of latitude, e.g., -43.5723 [World Geodetic System 1984].

resourcedefs.name: Longitude
resourcedefs.description: The decimal notation of longitude, e.g., 153.21760 [World Geodetic System 1984].

resourcedefs.name: Altitude
resourcedefs.description: The decimal notation of altitude in meters above sea level.

resourcedefs.name: Radius
resourcedefs.description: The value in the Radius Resource indicates the size in meters of a circular area around a point of geometry.

resourcedefs.name: Velocity
resourcedefs.description: The velocity in the LwM2M Client is defined in [3GPP-TS_23.032].

resourcedefs.name: Timestamp
resourcedefs.description: The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.

resourcedefs.name: Speed
resourcedefs.description: Speed is the time rate of change in position of a LwM2M Client without regard for direction: the scalar component of velocity.

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input State
resourcedefs.description: The current state of the presence sensor

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter
resourcedefs.description: The cumulative value of active state detected

resourcedefs.name: Digital Input Counter Reset
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Counter value

resourcedefs.name: Event UQ Wake Up
resourcedefs.description: Wake device from to notify if UQ mode

resourcedefs.name: Sensor Type
resourcedefs.description: The type of the sensor, for instance PIR type.

resourcedefs.name: Busy to Clear delay
resourcedefs.description: Delay from the detection state to the clear state in ms

resourcedefs.name: Clear to Busy delay
resourcedefs.description: Delay from the clear state to the busy state in ms

resourcedefs.name: Authorized devices
resourcedefs.description: Allow set devices whitelist

resourcedefs.name: OMA server
resourcedefs.description: Destination OMA server

resourcedefs.name: Ubibox IPv6
resourcedefs.description: Shows the ubibox address where preffix is get

resourcedefs.name: Ubibox IPv6 netmask
resourcedefs.description: Shows the ubibox netmask

resourcedefs.name: Ubibox device history resource
resourcedefs.description: Shows the Ubibox device RSSI history resource list

resourcedefs.name: SMS Tx Counter
resourcedefs.description: Indicate the total number of SMS successfully transmitted during the collection period.

resourcedefs.name: SMS Rx Counter
resourcedefs.description: Indicate the total number of SMS successfully received during the collection period.

resourcedefs.name: Tx Data
resourcedefs.description: Indicate the total amount of data transmitted during the collection period.

resourcedefs.name: Rx Data
resourcedefs.description: Indicate the total amount of data transmitted during the collection period.

resourcedefs.name: Max Message Size
resourcedefs.description: The maximum message size that is used during the collection period.

resourcedefs.name: Average Message Size
resourcedefs.description: The maximum message size that is used during the collection period.

resourcedefs.name: Start
resourcedefs.description: Reset resources 0-5 to 0 and start to collect information, If resource 8 (Collection Period) value is 0, the client will keep collecting information until resource 7 (Stop) is executed, otherwise the client will stop collecting information after specified period ended.

resourcedefs.name: Stop
resourcedefs.description: Stop collecting information, but do not reset resources 0-5.

resourcedefs.name: Collection Period
resourcedefs.description: The default collection period in seconds. The value 0 indicates that the collection period is not set.

resourcedefs.name: Min Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Max Measured Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

resourcedefs.name: Min Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Max Range Value
resourcedefs.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

resourcedefs.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
resourcedefs.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

resourcedefs.name: Units

resourcedefs.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

resourcedefs.description: If enabled, last device information resource will push observations about a device only one time at minute instead of each time is seen

resourcedefs.name: Interface name
resourcedefs.description: Human-readable identifier

resourcedefs.name: Enable
resourcedefs.description: Enable / Disable interface (0: Disabled - 1: Enabled)

resourcedefs.name: Radio Enabled
resourcedefs.description: 0: Disabled, 1: 2.4 GHz, 2: 5 GHz, 3: 0.9 GHz, 4: 3.7 GHz, 5: 45 GHz, 6: 60 GHz

resourcedefs.name: Status
resourcedefs.description: 0: Disabled, 1: UP (OK), 2: Error

resourcedefs.name: BSSID
resourcedefs.description: The MAC address of the interface, in hexadecimal form.

resourcedefs.name: SSID
resourcedefs.description: The Service Set Identifier for this interface.

resourcedefs.name: Broadcast SSID
resourcedefs.description: 0: Do not broadcast SSID, 1: Broadcast SSID

resourcedefs.name: Beacon Enabled
resourcedefs.description: 0: Do not broadcast beacons, 1: Broadcast beacons

resourcedefs.name: Mode
resourcedefs.description: 0: Access Point, 1: Client (Station), 2: Bridge, 3: Repeater

resourcedefs.name: Channel
resourcedefs.description: The current radio channel in use by this interface. 0: Disabled, 1: Enabled

resourcedefs.name: Auto Channel
resourcedefs.description: 0: Disabled, 1: Enabled

resourcedefs.name: Supported Channels
resourcedefs.description: Array of supported radio channels

resourcedefs.name: Channels In Use
resourcedefs.description: Array of channels which the access point has determined are in use. Including any channels in-use by access point itself.

resourcedefs.name: Regulatory Domain
resourcedefs.description: 802.11d Regulatory Domain String. First two octets are ISO/IEC 3166-1 two-character country code. The third octet is either (all enviroonments), (outside) or (inside)

resourcedefs.name: Authentication Mode
resourcedefs.description: 0: None (Open), 1: PSK, 2: EAP, 3: EAP+PSK, 4: EAPSIM

resourcedefs.name: Encryption Mode
resourcedefs.description: 0: AES (WPA2), 1: TKIP (WPA), 2: WEP (1)

resourcedefs.name: WPA Pre Shared Key
resourcedefs.description: WPA/WPA2 Key expressed as a hex string

resourcedefs.name: WPA Key Phrase
resourcedefs.description: WPA/WPA2 Key Phrase.

resourcedefs.name: WEP Encryption Type
resourcedefs.description: 0: None, 1: 40-bit, 2: 104-bit

resourcedefs.name: WEP Key Index
resourcedefs.description: Index of the default WEP key.

resourcedefs.name: WEP Key Phrase
resourcedefs.description: WPA/WPA2 Key Phrase.

resourcedefs.name: WEP Key 1
resourcedefs.description: WEP Key 1 expressed as a hexadecimal string. 10 Bytes for a 40 Bit key, 26 Bytes for a 104 Bit key

resourcedefs.name: WEP Key 2
resourcedefs.description: WEP Key 2 expressed as a hexadecimal string. 10 Bytes for a 40 Bit key, 26 Bytes for a 104 Bit key

resourcedefs.name: WEP Key 3
resourcedefs.description: WEP Key 3 expressed as a hexadecimal string. 10 Bytes for a 40 Bit key, 26 Bytes for a 104 Bit key

resourcedefs.name: WEP Key 4
resourcedefs.description: WEP Key 4 expressed as a hexadecimal string. 10 Bytes for a 40 Bit key, 26 Bytes for a 104 Bit key

resourcedefs.name: RADIUS Server
resourcedefs.description: RADIUS Authentication Server Address

resourcedefs.name: RADIUS Server Port
resourcedefs.description: RADIUS Authentication Server Port Number

resourcedefs.name: RADIUS Secret
resourcedefs.description: RADIUS Shared Secret

resourcedefs.name: WMM Supported
resourcedefs.description: 0: WMM NOT Supported, 1: WMM Wupported

resourcedefs.name: WMM Enabled
resourcedefs.description: 0: Disabled, 1: Enabled

resourcedefs.name: MAC Control Enabled
resourcedefs.description: 0: Any Client MAC Address accepted, 1: Client MAC address must exist in MACAddressList

resourcedefs.name: MAC Address List
resourcedefs.description: Array of allowed client MAC addresses, in hexadecimal form

resourcedefs.name: Total Bytes Sent
resourcedefs.description: Total number of bytes sent via this interface

resourcedefs.name: Total Bytes Received
resourcedefs.description: Total number of bytes received via this interface

resourcedefs.name: Total Packets Sent
resourcedefs.description: Total packets sent via this interface

resourcedefs.name: Total Packets Received
resourcedefs.description: Total packets received via this interface

resourcedefs.name: Transmit Errors
resourcedefs.description: Total number of packets which could not be transmitted because of errors.

resourcedefs.name: Receive Errors
resourcedefs.description: Total number of packets received with errors which prevented those packets from being delivered.

resourcedefs.name: Unicast Packets Sent
resourcedefs.description: Count of Unicast Packets Sent

resourcedefs.name: Unicast Packets Received
resourcedefs.description: Count of Unicast Packets Received

resourcedefs.name: Multicast Packets Sent
resourcedefs.description: Count of Multicast Packets Sent

resourcedefs.name: Multicast Packets Received
resourcedefs.description: Count of Multicast Packets Received

resourcedefs.name: Broadcast Packets Sent
resourcedefs.description: Count of Broadcast Packets Sent

resourcedefs.name: Broadcast Packets Received
resourcedefs.description: Count of Broadcast Packets Received

resourcedefs.name: Discard Packets Sent
resourcedefs.description: Count of valid outbound packets intentionally discarded without transmission, for example a packet may be discarded to manage buffer space.

resourcedefs.name: Discard Packets Received
resourcedefs.description: Count of valid packets received and intentionally discarded without delivery to the system, for example a packet may be discarded to manage buffer space.

resourcedefs.name: Unknown Packets Received
resourcedefs.description: Count of Unknown Packets Received

name: FIWARE Integration
description: Object to integrate complex values of FIWARE data models

resourcedefs.name: Human Location
resourcedefs.description: Humanized location

resourcedefs.name: Geojson location
resourcedefs.description: Location in geojson format

resourcedefs.name: Data Observed
resourcedefs.description: Obseration date

resourcedefs.name: Id
resourcedefs.description: Service Id

resourcedefs.name: Name
resourcedefs.description: Service Name

resourcedefs.name: Url
resourcedefs.description: Service Cloud Url

resourcedefs.name: Status
resourcedefs.description: Service Status 0: stopped, 1: active, 2: paused

resourcedefs.name: Reset
resourcedefs.description: Reset service

name: SmartSpot Metadata
description: Include some information about the proprietary name and the place in which the device is deployed

resourcedefs.name: Device Name
resourcedefs.description: This resource specifies a non technical name for the device. It helps in frontend representations

resourcedefs.name: Place Name
resourcedefs.description: This resource stores the device location in a readable way

resourcedefs.name: Image URL
resourcedefs.description: This resource stores a url that will redirect us to the image of the site where the device has been deployed
